## Blockfrost.getUnspentOutputs() method

This method fetches the UTxOs under a given address. The response is parsed into a TransactionUnspentOutput\[\] type, which is then returned. If the response is not in the expected format, an error is thrown.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getUnspentOutputs(address: Address | Credential, filter?: (utxo: BlockfrostUTxO) => boolean): Promise<TransactionUnspentOutput[]>;
```

Promise&lt;[TransactionUnspentOutput](./sdk.core.transactionunspentoutput.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;
